name: GST Migration Pending DN
query:
SELECT 
	dn.name as "DN:Link/Delivery Note:100", 
	dn.posting_date as "Posting Date:Date:80",
	dn.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:100", 
	dni.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:100", 
	dni.description as "Description::100", 
	(dni.qty - ifnull((select sum(sid.qty) FROM `tabSales Invoice Item` sid, `tabSales Invoice` si 
		WHERE sid.delivery_note = dn.name and
		sid.parent = si.name and
		sid.qty > 0 AND
		sid.dn_detail = dni.name), 0)) as "Pending Qty:Float:80",
	
	dni.qty as "DN Qty:Float:80", 
	dni.base_rate as "Base Rate:Currency:80", 
	dni.rate as "DN Rate:Currency:80", 
	dn.currency as "Cur:Link/Currency:80",
	dn.selling_price_list as "PL:Link/Price List:80",
	dni.name, dni.so_detail, dni.against_sales_order,
	dn.taxes_and_charges, dn.ignore_pricing_rule, so.track_trial
     	
FROM `tabDelivery Note` dn, `tabDelivery Note Item` dni, `tabSales Order` so

	WHERE dn.docstatus = 1 AND so.docstatus = 1
		AND so.name = dni.against_sales_order
    	AND dn.name = dni.parent
    	AND (dni.qty - ifnull((select sum(sid.qty) FROM `tabSales Invoice Item` sid, 
			`tabSales Invoice` si
        	WHERE sid.delivery_note = dn.name
				AND sid.parent = si.name
				AND sid.qty > 0
				AND sid.dn_detail = dni.name), 0)>=0.01)
	
ORDER BY dn.posting_date asc
